trans-unit.source: Concatenates two world-space to page-space transformations

seg-source.mrk: Concatenates two world-space to page-space transformations

target.mrk: Concatenates two world-space to page-space transformations

trans-unit.source: $tagXFORM structure that specifies the first transformation.

seg-source.mrk: $tagXFORM structure that specifies the first transformation.

target.mrk: $tagXFORM structure that specifies the first transformation.

trans-unit.source: $tagXFORM structure that specifies the second transformation.

seg-source.mrk: $tagXFORM structure that specifies the second transformation.

target.mrk: $tagXFORM structure that specifies the second transformation.

trans-unit.source: $tagXFORM structure that contains the combined transformation.

seg-source.mrk: $tagXFORM structure that contains the combined transformation.

target.mrk: $tagXFORM structure that contains the combined transformation.

trans-unit.source: Applying the combined transformation has the same effect as applying the first transformation and then applying the second transformation.

seg-source.mrk: Applying the combined transformation has the same effect as applying the first transformation and then applying the second transformation.

target.mrk: Applying the combined transformation has the same effect as applying the first transformation and then applying the second transformation.
